effect.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
effect.fr: Lancez 2 pièces. Cette attaque inflige 50 dégâts pour chaque côté face.
effect.es: Lanza 2 monedas. Este ataque hace 50 puntos de daño por cada cara.
effect.it: Lancia due volte una moneta. Questo attacco infligge 50 danni ogni volta che esce testa.
effect.pt: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
effect.de: Wirf 2 Münzen. Diese Attacke fügt 50 Schadenspunkte pro Kopf zu.

description.en: It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives anyone who messes up a flower bed.
